com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.manager.listeners

Interface ScanStatusListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleScanStatusListener

    public interface ScanStatusListener
    Listener used to inform when devices scanning is started and stopped.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMonitoringCycleStart()
      Called when monitoring cycle starts.
      void onMonitoringCycleStop()
      Called when monitoring cycle ends.
      void onScanError(ScanError scanError)
      Callback invoked when scanning error occured.
      void onScanStart()
      Callback invoked when scanning is started.
      void onScanStop()
      Callback invoked when scanning is stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • onScanStart

        void onScanStart()
        Callback invoked when scanning is started.

      • onScanStop

        void onScanStop()
        Callback invoked when scanning is stopped.

      • onScanError

        void onScanError(ScanError scanError)
        Callback invoked when scanning error occured.
        Parameters:
        scanError - ScanError

      • onMonitoringCycleStart

        void onMonitoringCycleStart()
        Called when monitoring cycle starts. Invoked only if ScanPeriod set is different than ScanPeriod.RANGING;

      • onMonitoringCycleStop

        void onMonitoringCycleStop()
        Called when monitoring cycle ends. Invoked only if ScanPeriod set is different than ScanPeriod.RANGING;
